messages.content:
We provide mobile telematics as a service to power tracking services inside 3rd party mobile applications to collect, process and analyze driving data. Our proprietary solution turns any smartphone into a powerful tracking device. No telematics-device is required.

The Roam iOS SDK makes it quick and easy to build a location tracker for your iOS app. We provide powerful and customizable tracking modes and features that can be used to collect your users’ location updates.

■Summary:

*   Provides mobile telematics as a service to power tracking services inside third-party mobile apps
*   No telematics device is required, as the solution turns any smartphone into a powerful tracking device
*   The Roam iOS SDK provides a quick and easy way to build a location tracker for an iOS app, with powerful and customizable tracking modes and features available for collecting location updates from users
